DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to establish the proportion of Bulgarian patients on lipid-lowering pharmacological treatment reaching the LDL-C goals according to the Fourth Joint European Task Force guidelines.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Undertreatment of Patients With Dyslipidemia in Bulgaria
DOC.criteria: Lipid lowering drug treatment for at least 3 months, with no dose change for a minimum of 6 weeks Signed Informed Consent Informed Consent not provided
